person.persName: William Preston Bacon (Owen County saddler and USA soldier)

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, saddler. Owen County, Kentucky, native. Married to Vincentia D. Smith Bacon in Owen County, Kentucky, on September 2, 1856. Saddler in Owen County in 1850. Saddler in Owen County in 1860. Served in the 30th Kentucky Infantry as a captain from February 19, 1864 to April 18, 1865.
